author: HuguesBrun
body:
backport of PR #7491 

The PR is working fine in `CMSSW_7_3_1_patch1` but the compilation fails in the last IB (`CMSSW_7_3_X_2015-02-04-0200`): for this IB the RecoEgamma/EgammaHLTProducers package is not compiling even without the PR.
title: backport of PR #7491 (regional PF clustering for muon)
